hero.title: Join a team of builders
hero.description: Are you ready to modernize sales tax and help every business stay compliant?

data.html:
You’ll want to work with us.

Our hustle is gigantic and we’ve scaled some of the biggest brands in software and e-commerce

Numeral is the end-to-end sales tax platform for growing e-commerce and SaaS brands. We are disrupting a massive market, and our share is growing by the day.

Our founders, Sam and Matt, have scaled 9-figure businesses together and led engineering teams at companies like Notion and Stripe. Our team is scrappy, gets stuff done, and moves the ball forward. Learn more about us!

data.text:
EngineeringLiAutonomy is one of my favorite things about working at an early-stage company like Numeral. The transparency, enthusiasm among team members, and collaboration was apparent from day one.
























ProductDanielNumeral is in a sweet spot opportunity. It’s a solution space competitors couldn’t easily recreate, but also not something that will take years and years to develop a great solution for.
























EngineeringWatsonI love the complexity. There is so much data feeding into our engine and automation on the dashboard through tons of APIs.
























GrowthNateIt’s easy to market a product that is just so good. The growth has been incredible to watch. I knew I had to join, and working with Sam and Matt has been the highlight of my career.

data.html:
<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
